thread.title: Entergy Plans to Shutdown Pilgrim Nuclear Plant by June 2019
thread.title_full: Entergy Plans to Shutdown Pilgrim Nuclear Plant by June 2019 - WSJ

author: Tess Stynes
title: Entergy Plans to Shutdown Pilgrim Nuclear Plant by June 2019
text:
Entergy Corp. said it plans to shut down the Pilgrim nuclear power plant in Massachusetts by June 2019, citing poor market conditions, lower revenue and higher operating costs.
The New Orleans-based company, which owns utilities in Arkansas, Louisiana, Mississippi and Texas, and sells power on the wholesale market, has been pressured by low... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
